column1: EVTDESC_neuhumanist_1;I now wish to solemnly choose which path of the Classics I should follow
column2: diving into them with the everlasting goal of seeking Enlightenment for the good of the realm !;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the path of spirit and resistance to the material world.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
for the method and objectivity of Enlightenment.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
for I and only I control my Enlightenment.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the path to Sehnsucht and harmony.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
I have been struggling with finding something new and exciting while studying the Classics... While interrogating myself regarding Existentalim this morning
column3: I realized I should stop being passive
column4: and try to be part of the spiritual advancement that is so important for the well-being of our realm and faith.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
